data.title: Choose the correct answer for each question

sections.summary: Teaching Focus: Modal verb + base verb + object.
sections.explain: Subject: You. Modal Verb: should. Base Verb: check. Object: your email.

words.word: You should check your email.
You check should your email.
Should check your email you.

sections.summary: Teaching Focus: Present perfect continuous tense.
sections.explain: Subject: They. Verb phrase: have been waiting. Time marker: for an hour.

words.word: They have been waiting for an hour.
They waiting have been for an hour.
Have they been for an hour waiting.

sections.explain: Subject: The woman. Relative clause: who lives next door. Verb: is a teacher.

words.word: The woman who lives next door is a teacher.
The woman lives who next door is a teacher.
The who woman lives next door is a teacher.

sections.explain: Subject: The dishes. Passive verb: are washed. Agent: every evening.

words.word: The dishes are washed every evening.
Are washed the dishes every evening.
The every evening are dishes washed.

sections.summary: Teaching Focus: Adverb position in compound tense.
sections.explain: Subject: He. Verb: has always been. Complement: a good friend.

words.word: He has always been a good friend.
He has been always a good friend.
Always he has been a good friend.

sections.explain: If-clause: If you study hard. Main clause: you will pass the test.

words.word: If you study hard, you will pass the test.
If study hard you, pass you will the test.
You will pass the test if hard you study.

sections.summary: Teaching Focus: Relative clause (that) with object.
sections.explain: Subject: I. Verb: bought. Object with clause: the book that you recommended.

words.word: I bought the book that you recommended.
I the book bought that you recommended.
That book I recommended bought you.

sections.summary: Teaching Focus: Present perfect with object.
sections.explain: Subject: We. Verb phrase: have finished. Object: our homework.

words.word: We have finished our homework.
We our homework have finished.
Have we our homework finished.

sections.explain: Subject: The room. Passive verb: was cleaned. Time: yesterday.

words.word: The room was cleaned yesterday.
The room yesterday cleaned was.
Cleaned was the room yesterday.

sections.explain: Subject: She. Verb phrase: went to the library. Purpose (infinitive): to study.

words.word: She went to the library to study.
To study she went to the library.
She to study went the library.
